english_example_sentence: This old building, with new plans, was going to become a modern center.
russian_example_sentence: Это старое здание, с новыми планами, должно было стать современным центром.
turkish_example_sentence: Bu eski bina, yeni planlarla modern bir merkez olacaktı.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Bu eski bina, yeni planlarla modern bir merkez ______.
